Name: Analog Party Sim
About the game: Do you rember parties? No, not those video calls where you drink alone in your living room, parties! Where you would stagger between rooms singing along to songs that you don't know the words to, wondering if the next person you accidentally spill your drink on could be THE ONE! Well now you can recreate all of your favourite times from almost forgotten 'Old World Parties' with the ANALOG PARTY SIM! Become the Host of the party, make sure your guests have a good time, enjoy the music and walk the line between being the right amount of drunk and drinking so much that they have their (now ex-) Partner's 83 year old Grandmother in a headlock while saying how happy they were to be invited... (That's a true story). Play through three difficulty modes or try your hand at the Endless Mode, where you attempt to keep the party going forever! This game started out as my submission to Ludum Dare 46, and excluding the particle effects and sound effects, was a completely solo effort. I hope you like it! Don't party Digital, party Analog (Digitally).
